title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing AI Agent Ecosystems: MCP Server & Agent Security at Scale (ISV325)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保护AI代理生态系统：大规模MCP服务器和代理安全 (ISV325)
abstract: Organizations deploying MCP servers and AI agents lack visibility and security controls for supply chain onboarding and runtime tool execution, creating compliance risks and slowing deployments. The open-source unified MCP server and agents registry partners with Cisco AI Defense to deliver automated, multi-layered security scanning—YARA pattern detection, LLM analysis via Amazon Bedrock, and Cisco proprietary threat detection—eliminating bottlenecks while protecting against vulnerabilities. Platform teams achieve unified governance with security integrated into CI/CD pipelines and Amazon CloudWatch. Extend governance to agents on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. Learn proven patterns for scaling secure AI agent deployments without sacrificing speed or compliance.pipelines and Amazon CloudWatch. Extend governance to agents on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. Learn proven patterns for scaling secure AI agent deployments without sacrificing speed or compliance.
abstract_cn: 部署MCP服务器和AI代理的组织缺乏对供应链入职和运行时工具执行的可见性和安全控制,这会带来合规风险并减缓部署速度。开源统一MCP服务器和代理注册表与Cisco AI Defense合作,提供自动化的多层安全扫描——YARA模式检测、通过Amazon Bedrock进行的LLM分析以及Cisco专有威胁检测——在防范漏洞的同时消除瓶颈。平台团队通过将安全集成到CI/CD流水线和Amazon CloudWatch中实现统一治理。将治理扩展到Amazon Bedrock AgentCore上的代理。学习经过验证的模式,在不牺牲速度或合规性的情况下扩展安全的AI代理部署。
